mapper.insert: insert into dcdg_customer_attention_base (ATTENTION_ID, CUST_ID, SOURCE_ID, ATTENTION_TYPE, ADD_TIME) values (#{attentionId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{custId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{sourceId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{attentionType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.select: select ATTENTION_ID, CUST_ID, SOURCE_ID, ATTENTION_TYPE, ADD_TIME from dcdg_customer_attention_base
select count(1) from dcdg_customer_attention_base WHERE CUST_ID = #{custId,jdbcType=CHAR} AND ATTENTION_TYPE = #{attentionType,jdbcType=TINYINT} AND SOURCE_ID = #{sourceId,jdbcType=CHAR}
select ATTENTION_ID from dcdg_customer_attention_base WHERE CUST_ID = #{custId,jdbcType=CHAR} AND ATTENTION_TYPE = #{attentionType,jdbcType=TINYINT} AND SOURCE_ID = #{sourceId,jdbcType=CHAR}
select SOURCE_ID from dcdg_customer_attention_base WHERE CUST_ID = #{custId,jdbcType=CHAR} AND ATTENTION_TYPE = #{attentionType,jdbcType=TINYINT}
select count(1) from dcdg_customer_attention_base where SOURCE_ID = #{sourceId,jdbcType=CHAR} and ATTENTION_TYPE = #{attentionType,jdbcType=TINYINT}
